Projects

Here is a list of my academic projects.

  • Sentiment Analysis:Implemented LSTM and Bert models to classify 1,000,000 customer reviews in Chinese, and improved the validation accuracy for LSTM model by applying the Word2Vec embedding and semi-supervised learning method.
    Report
    Code

  • Picture Generation:Designed GAN models to generate Japanese Anime avatars and improved results using DCGAN and WGAN.
    Report
    Code

  • Animal Classification with Domain Adversarial Training:Classify pictures of different animals using domain-adversarial training, solving the problem of different distribution of source input data and target input data.
    Report
    Code

  • Road Sign Classification:Devised a CNN model using TensorFlow to classify 43 types of road signs (dataset: GTSRB), and employed advanced machine learning methods such as data-augmentation, batch-normalization, and dropout to improve accuracy.
    Code
    Dataset

  • Wine Quality Prediction:Devised various machine learning models (e.g. Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, Bagging, XGBoost, etc) in R to predict the quality of red and white wine, and compare the model performance.
    Report
    Dataset

  • Question Answering System:Designed a simple Question Answering System that can answer questions based on the corpus given using the tf-idf model.
    Code
    Question Answering Introduction

  • Winning Strategy for the game Nim:Apply reinforcement learning to train the winning strategy for the game Nim.
    Code
    Game Introduction

  • Winning Strategy for the game Tic-Tac-Toe:Apply minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning to design the winning strategy for the game Tic-Tac-Toe.
    Code
    Game Introduction

  • Teaming Strategies: This is a Math Modeling project of the Interdisciplinary Contest in Modeling in 2020. As the caption of a team with 3 people, I lead my team members to build Mathmatical models to analyze a soccer team's performance. Our solution stood out and we were designated as meritorious winner.
    Report
    Problem Description
